subject: Olympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Swedish wrestler Ara Abrahamian lost his appeal to win back the bronze medal he discarded in protest at the Beijing Games. The Court of Arbitration for Sport said it rejected Abrahamian’s appeal of the International Olympic Committee’s decision to disqualify him from the Greco-Roman competition. Abrahamian, 33, was disqualified after throwing his medal down at the awards ceremony to protest the refereeing of his semifinal.
